author: cschneider
msg: Moving header related classes to common.header. Seems they were there already so we had duplicates.

author: kkolinko
msg: Allow ANT style variables in the common.loader and other *.loader properties in conf/catalina.properties
I do not implement the substitution for any property as suggested by BZ 50677,
but only for the class loader ones. I think this is sufficient for the use case
and does not break backwards compatibility.
Most of the code is copied from ClassLoaderLogManager.replace().

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-2959: separate passing down of query norms from passing down of top-level (e.g. bq's) boosts
